meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her handiwork, a beautiful scarf she knitted herself.
meanings.sent2: The intricate handiwork on the wooden table was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: His handiwork in fixing the broken toy made it look even more broken!
meanings.sent4: The artist's handiwork transformed the blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The delicate handiwork of the lace curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: Skill or craftsmanship in creating something.
meanings.sent1: His handiwork in carpentry was evident in the beautifully crafted chair.
meanings.sent2: The potter's handiwork was admired for its attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: Her handiwork in baking cookies always resulted in delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: The tailor's handiwork in sewing the intricate design was impeccable.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler's handiwork in creating the necklace was exquisite.

meanings.sent1: The wooden birdhouse was a fine example of his handiwork.
meanings.sent2: The intricate clock was a testament to the craftsman's handiwork.
meanings.sent3: His handiwork in building the sandcastle was quickly washed away by the tide.
meanings.sent4: The delicate embroidery on the dress showcased the seamstress's handiwork.
meanings.sent5: The handiwork of the blacksmith could be seen in the sturdy iron gate.
